parameters.name: messages

options.filterByFormula: ={{IF($node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.sessionToken, 'token="' + $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.sessionToken + '"', 'FALSE()')}}

parameters.operation: ={{$node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records && $node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records.length > 0 ? 'update' : 'create'}}
parameters.id: ={{$node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records && $node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records.length > 0 ? $node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records[0].id : undefined}}

fieldValues.fieldValue: ={{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.detailedFeedback || $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.executiveSummary }}
={{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.nextActions || $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.recommendation }}

parameters.subject: =🌸 Interview Report: {{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.candidateName }} - {{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.recommendation }} ({{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.averageScore }}/10)

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "status": "success",
  "message": "Interview processed and candidate record updated",
  "candidateName": "{{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.candidateName }}",
  "overallScore": {{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.overallScore }},
  "recommendation": "{{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.recommendation }}",
  "sessionId": "{{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.sessionId }}",
  "sessionToken": "{{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.sessionToken }}",
  "existingCandidate": {{$node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records && $node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records.length > 0 ? true : false}},
  "recordOperation": "{{$node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records && $node['Lookup Candidate by Token'].json.records.length > 0 ? 'updated' : 'created'}}",
  "processedAt": "{{ $node['Calculate Statistics & Compile Report'].json.reportData.generatedAt }}"
}
